title: Audio Design Strategy for Practical Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and intermediate-level domain expertise
context.additional_context: Language proficiency enhancement program for in-service professionals to improve job performance.

learning_goals: Learners enhance language learning effectiveness by over 30% by designing audio content that utilizes narrative structures.
Learners develop educational materials applying repetitive listening strategies that account for the transient nature of auditory information.
Learners create audio scenarios incorporating environmental sound elements to enhance learning immersion.
Learners measure learning outcomes by designing assessment tools that reflect auditory attention focus and semantic differentiation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
